bill.title: Income tax; provide a credit for certain energy efficiency improvements to homestead property.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize An Income Tax Credit For Certain Costs And Expenses Incurred By A Taxpayer For Certain Energy Efficiency Improvements To Property Used As A Dwelling By The Taxpayer And Upon Which Homestead Exemption Is Granted; To Authorize An Income Tax Credit For Certain Expenses Incurred For The Installation Of A Wind Or Solar Energy System In The Residence Of The Taxpayer Or At A Residential Rental Apartment Complex Owned By The Taxpayer; To Exempt From Ad Valorem Taxation The True Value Added To A Residence Or A Residential Rental Apartment Complex As A Result Of The Installation Of A Wind Energy System Or A Solar Energy System That Is Eligible For The Tax Credit; And For Related Purposes.
